responsibilities: Collaborating effectively with colleagues to advance production machine-learning systems and applications.
Conceptualizing, experimenting with, and assessing AI/ML-based software systems.
Developing, testing, and maintaining high-quality, production-ready code.
Demonstrating technical leadership by taking charge of cross-team projects.
Creating libraries and frameworks that underpin reliable and testable systems.
Representing Goldman Sachs at conferences and within open-source communities.
skills: Expertise in machine learning, deep learning, natural language processing, information retrieval, time series analysis, and recommender systems.
Proficiency in contemporary programming languages like Python, C++, or Java.
Ability to address unique challenges in machine learning systems within the financial domain.
Technical leadership and project management skills.
analysis: The job responsibilities and skills listed focus on machine learning and AI/ML-based software systems. The responsibilities include collaborating on machine-learning systems, conceptualizing AI/ML-based software, and developing production-ready code. The skills required include expertise in machine learning, deep learning, natural language processing, and information retrieval. While these areas are related to AI and machine learning, there is no explicit mention of Generative AI (GenAI) or language models (LLMs) specifically. The focus seems to be on general machine learning applications within the financial domain rather than on generative models or language models. Therefore, based on the provided information, it does not explicitly indicate work with GenAI or LLMs.
